text: @Wastereader is right #Panorama that @EnvAgency needed to be propery resourced and that UK public need to wise up on #flytipping - but the platitudes trotted out by government are the same ones we heard when we published our findings almost a decade ago!

@EnvAgency Emma Viner you should be ashamed of yourself. Watching panoramas programme on fly tipping- you skirt around the answers and don't seem like you actually care about the situation. You're letting people down. This country is turning into a tip!
